question: Which among the following great revolutionaries was the brain behind the ‘Chittagong Armoury Raid’?
explanation: Chittagong armoury raid was conducted on 18 April 1930. The operation was led by Surya Sen. The mission was conducted by the members of the Indian Republican Army. He was arrested on 16th April 1933 and was hanged on 12th January 1934.
